TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Xml extends System.Web.UI.Control

summary.span: 显示 XML 文档，不进行格式化或使用可扩展样式表语言转换 (XSLT)。

span.span: Displays an XML document without formatting or using Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformations (XSLT).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [指定 XML 数据Specifying XML Data](#specifying_xml_data) - [指定 XSL 转换Specifying an XSL Transformation](#specifying_an_xsl_transformation) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用 控件可以显示 XML 文档的内容，而无需对其进行格式设置或使用 XSL 转换。Use the control to display the contents of an XML document without formatting or using XSL Transformations. ## 指定 XML 数据Specifying XML Data 通过设置三个属性之一来指定要显示的 XML 文档。The XML document to display is specified by setting one of three properties. 这三个属性表示可以显示的不同类型的 XML 文档。These three properties represent the different types of XML documents that can be displayed. 通过设置相应的属性，可以显示 、XML 字符串或 XML 文件。You can display a , an XML string, or an XML file by setting the appropriate property. 下表列出了用于指定 XML 文档的属性。The following table lists the properties for specifying the XML document. |propertiesProperty|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||使用 对象设置 XML 文档。Sets the XML document using a object. **警告：** 此属性已过时。**Warning:** This property is obsolete. 使用此部分中列出的其他属性之一设置 控件的 XML 内容。Use one of the other properties listed in this section to set the XML content for the control.| ||使用字符串设置 XML 文档。Sets the XML document using a string. **注意：** 通常通过在 控件的开始和结束 `` 标记之间放置文本，以声明方式设置此属性。**Note:** This property is commonly set declaratively by placing text between the opening and closing `` tags of the control.| ||使用文件设置 XML 文档。Sets the XML document using a file.| > [!NOTE] > 至少必须设置一个 XML 文档属性以显示 XML 文档。At least one of the XML document properties must be set to display an XML document. 如果设置了多个 XML 文档属性，则显示最后一个属性集中引用的 XML 文档。If more than one XML document property is set, the XML document referenced in the last property set is displayed. 其他属性中的文档将被忽略。The documents in the other properties are ignored. ## 指定 XSL 转换Specifying an XSL Transformation 您可以选择指定 XSL 转换（XSLT）样式表，在将 XML 文档写入输出流之前对其进行格式化，方法是设置以下两个属性之一。You can optionally specify an XSL Transformation (XSLT) style sheet that formats the XML document before it is written to the output stream by setting one of two properties. 这两个属性表示可用于对 XML 文档进行格式设置的不同类型的 XSL 转换样式表。The two properties represent the different types of XSL Transformation style sheets that can be used to format the XML document. 您可以通过设置相应的属性，将 XML 文档与 对象或使用 XSL 转换样式表文件进行格式设置。You can format the XML document with a object or with an XSL Transformation style sheet file by setting the appropriate property. 如果未指定 XSL 转换样式表，则将使用默认格式显示 XML 文档。If no XSL Transformation style sheet is specified, the XML document is displayed using the default format. 下表列出了用于指定 XSL 转换样式表的属性。The following table lists the properties for specifying an XSL Transformation style sheet. |propertiesProperty|说明Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||使用指定的 对象设置 XML 文档的格式。Formats the XML document using the specified object. **注意：** 使用 对象需要 `Full Trust` 权限。**Note:** Using a object requires `Full Trust` permissions.| ||使用指定的 XSL 转换样式表文件设置 XML 文档格式。Formats the XML document using the specified XSL Transformation style sheet file.| > [!NOTE] > XSL 转换样式表是可选的。The XSL Transformation style sheet is optional. 不需要设置 或 属性。You do not need to set the or the property. 如果同时设置了这两个 XSL 转换样式表属性，则最后一个属性集将确定用于设置 XML 文档格式的 XSL 转换样式表。If both XSL Transformation style sheet properties are set, the last property set determines which XSL Transformation style sheet is used to format the XML document. 其他属性将被忽略。The other property is ignored. 类还提供了 属性，该属性使您能够为 XSL 转换样式表提供可选参数。The class also provides the property, which enables you to provide the XSL Transformation style sheet with optional arguments. 参数可以是 XSL 转换（XSLT）参数或扩展对象。The arguments can be either XSL Transformations (XSLT) parameters or extension objects. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 和 示例 XML 文件和 XSL 转换样式表中的对象。The following code example shows how to create and objects from a sample XML file and an XSL Transformation style sheet. 然后，XML 控件使用对象来显示 XML 文档。The objects are then used by the XML control to display the XML document. [!code-aspx-csharp[XmlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlClassExample/CS/xmlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[XmlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlClassExample/VB/xmlvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性已过时。The property is obsolete. 若要指定将在 控件中显示的 XML，请使用 属性或 属性。To specify the XML that will be displayed in the control, use the property or the property. 有关这些方法的详细信息，请参阅 控件的类概述。For more information about these alternatives, see the class overview for the control. 将通过以下三种方式之一来指定要在 控件中显示的 XML 文档。The XML document to display in the control is specified in one of three ways. 可以通过设置相应的属性来指定 对象、XML 字符串或 XML 文件。You can specify a object, an XML string, or an XML file by setting the appropriate property. 属性用于指定要在控件中显示的 （表示 XML 文档）。The property is used to specify a (representing an XML document) to display in the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 和 示例 XML 文件和 XSL 转换样式表中的对象。The following code example shows how to create and objects from a sample XML file and an XSL Transformation style sheet. 然后，XML 控件使用对象来显示 XML 文档。The objects are then used by the XML control to display the XML document. [!code-aspx-csharp[XmlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlClassExample/CS/xmlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[XmlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlClassExample/VB/xmlvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DocumentContent { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DocumentContent : string with get, set

summary.span: 设置包含要在 控件中显示的 XML 文档的字符串。

span.span: Sets a string that contains the XML document to display in the control.

value.span: 包含要在 控件中显示的 XML 文档的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the XML document to display in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将通过以下三种方式之一来指定要在 控件中显示的 XML 文档。The XML document to display in the control is specified in one of three ways. 可以通过设置相应的属性来指定 对象、XML 字符串或 XML 文件。You can specify a object, an XML string, or an XML file by setting the appropriate property. 属性用于指定要在控件中显示的 XML 字符串（表示 XML 文档）。The property is used to specify an XML string (representing an XML document) to display in the control. 属性通常不是以编程方式设置的，或者设置为控件的属性。The property is not typically programmatically set, or set as an attribute of the control. 相反，XML 字符串通常通过在控件的开始和结束 `` 标记之间放置文本来以声明方式进行设置。Instead, the XML string is usually set declaratively by placing text between the opening and closing `` tags of the control. > [!NOTE] > 尽管 属性同时包含 `get` 和 `set` 访问器，但只有 `set` 访问器是有用的。Although the property contains both `get` and `set` accessors, only the `set` accessor is useful. 如果使用 `get` 访问器，则返回 。If you use the `get` accessor, is returned.

related.span: XML Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: XML Web Server Control Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DocumentSource { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DocumentSource : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 控件中显示的 XML 文档的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to an XML document to display in the control.

value.span: 要在 控件中显示的 XML 文档的路径。

span.span: The path to an XML document to display in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将通过以下三种方式之一来指定要在 控件中显示的 XML 文档。The XML document to display in the control is specified in one of three ways. 可以通过设置相应的属性来指定 对象、XML 字符串或 XML 文件。You can specify a object, an XML string, or an XML file by setting the appropriate property. 属性用于指定要在控件中显示的 XML 文件（表示 XML 文档）的路径。The property is used to specify the path to an XML file (representing an XML document) to display in the control. 您可以使用相对路径或绝对路径。You can use a relative or an absolute path. 相对路径将文件的位置与 Web 窗体页或用户控件的位置相关联，而无需在服务器上指定完整路径。A relative path relates the location of the file to the location of the Web Forms page or user control, without specifying a complete path on the server. 路径相对于网页的位置。The path is relative to the location of the Web page. 这样就可以更轻松地将整个站点移动到服务器上的另一个目录中，而无需在代码中更新文件的路径。This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the path to the file in code. 绝对路径提供完整路径，因此，将该站点移动到另一个目录需要更新代码。An absolute path provides the complete path, so moving the site to another directory requires updating the code. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件中的 XSL 转换显示 XML 文档。The following code example shows how to display an XML document using an XSL Transform in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[XmlControlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlControlClassExample/CS/xmlcontrolcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[XmlControlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlControlClassExample/VB/xmlcontrolvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象，它在 XML 文档被写入输出流之前对其进行格式化。

span.span: The that formats the XML document before it is written to the output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用 控件显示 XML 文档时，您可以选择指定用于设置 XML 文档格式的可扩展样式表语言转换（XSLT）样式表，然后使用以下两种方法之一将其写入输出流。When using the control to display an XML document, you can optionally specify an Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformation (XSLT) style sheet that formats the XML document, before it is written to the output stream in one of two ways. 可以使用 对象或 XSL 转换样式表文件设置 XML 文档格式。You can format the XML document with either a object or an XSL Transformation style sheet file. 如果未指定 XSL 转换文档，则使用默认格式显示 XML 文档。If no XSL Transform document is specified, the XML document is displayed using the default format. 属性用于指定一个 对象（表示 XSL 转换文档），该对象用于在 XML 文档写入输出流之前对其进行格式化。The property is used to specify a object (representing an XSL Transform document) used to format the XML document before it is written to the output stream. > [!NOTE] > 使用 对象需要 `Full Trust` 权限。Using a object requires `Full Trust` permissions. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 和 示例 XML 文件和 XSL 转换样式表中的对象。The following code example shows how to create and objects from a sample XML file and an XSL Transformation style sheet. 然后，XML 控件使用对象来显示 XML 文档。The objects are then used by the XML control to display the XML document. [!code-aspx-csharp[XmlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlClassExample/CS/xmlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[XmlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlClassExample/VB/xmlvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 ，它包含传递给样式表并在扩展样式表语言转换 (XSLT) 中使用的可选参数列表。

span.span: Gets or sets a that contains a list of optional arguments passed to the style sheet and used during the Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformation (XSLT).

value.span: ，它包含传递给样式表并在 XSL 转换中使用的可选参数列表。

span.span: A that contains a list of optional arguments passed to the style sheet and used during the XSL Transformation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性提供具有可选参数的 XSL 转换样式表。Use the property to provide the XSL Transformation style sheet with optional arguments. 参数可以是 XSLT 参数或扩展对象。The arguments can be either XSLT parameters or extension objects. 有关使用 类的详细信息，请参阅[Style 表参数和扩展对象的 XsltArgumentList](/dotnet/standard/data/xml/xsltargumentlist-for-style-sheet-parameters-and-extension-objects)。For more information about using the class, see [XsltArgumentList for Style Sheet Parameters and Extension Objects](/dotnet/standard/data/xml/xsltargumentlist-for-style-sheet-parameters-and-extension-objects).

span.span: XML Web Server Control Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TransformSource { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TransformSource : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置扩展样式表语言转换 (XSLT) 样式表的路径，该样式表在 XML 文档被写入输出流之前对其进行格式化。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to an Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformation (XSLT) style sheet that formats the XML document before it is written to the output stream.

value.span: XSL 转换样式表的路径，该样式表在 XML 文档被写入输出流之前对其进行格式化。

span.span: The path to an XSL Transformation style sheet that formats the XML document before it is written to the output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用 控件显示 XML 文档时，您可以选择指定 XSL 转换样式表，在将 XML 文档写入输出流之前，可以通过以下两种方式之一对其进行格式化。When using the control to display an XML document, you can optionally specify an XSL Transformation style sheet that formats the XML document before it is written to the output stream in one of two ways. 您可以使用 对象或使用 XSL 转换样式表文件来格式化 XML 文档。You can either format the XML document with a object or with an XSL Transformation style sheet file. 如果未指定 XSL 转换样式表，则将使用默认格式显示 XML 文档。If no XSL Transformation style sheet is specified, the XML document is displayed using the default format. 属性用于指定 XSL 转换样式表文件（表示 XSL 转换样式表）的路径，该文件用于在 XML 文档写入输出流之前对其进行格式化。The property is used to specify the path to an XSL Transformation style sheet file (representing an XSL Transformation style sheet) used to format the XML document before it is written to the output stream. 您可以使用相对路径或绝对路径。You can use a relative or an absolute path. 相对路径将文件的位置与 Web 窗体页或用户控件的位置相关联，而无需在服务器上指定完整路径。A relative path relates the location of the file to the location of the Web Forms page or user control, without specifying a complete path on the server. 路径相对于网页的位置。The path is relative to the location of the Web page. 这样就可以更轻松地将整个站点移动到服务器上的另一个目录中，而无需在代码中更新文件的路径。This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the path to the file in code. 绝对路径提供完整路径，因此，将该站点移动到另一个目录需要更新代码。An absolute path provides the complete path, so moving the site to another directory requires updating the code. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件中的 XSL 转换显示 XML 文档。The following code example shows how to display an XML document using an XSL Transform in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[XmlControlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlControlClassExample/CS/xmlcontrolcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[XmlControlClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/XmlControlClassExample/VB/xmlcontrolvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::XPath::XPathNavigator ^ XPathNavigator { System::Xml::XPath::XPathNavigator ^ get(); void set(System::Xml::XPath::XPathNavigator ^ value); };
member this.XPathNavigator : System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置用于导航和编辑与 控件关联的 XML 数据的光标模型。

span.span: Gets or sets a cursor model for navigating and editing the XML data associated with the control.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于将 对象与 控件相关联。This property can be used to associate an object with the control. 对象是从实现 接口（如 和 类）的类创建的。An object is created from a class that implements the interface, such as the and classes. 由 对象创建的对象是只读的，并且可以编辑 对象创建 对象。 objects created by objects are read-only, and objects created by objects can be edited. 对象的只读或可编辑状态是使用 类的 属性确定的。An object's read-only or editable status is determined using the property of the class.

related.span: XML Web 服务器控件概述
